name: Bubble Blast - Pop Match Mania
description:
Play the latest version of the classic, casual bubble pop game for FREE!

Bubble Blast Pop Match Mania is a Legendary classic bubble pop puzzle game with simple rules that players of all ages can enjoy!

Look for patterns, match the bubbles with the same color and shoot the bubble to blast them. Keep advancing to higher stages to build a bubble empire. Become a mastery of bubble popping mania.

Get combos to receive special boosters, and then super-charge your shots to blast even more bubbles!

Challenge yourself to fantastic game play!
Try to collect as many stars as possible!

A brainteaser for you! Do you think you have what it takes to clear all levels with the perfect score?

Bubble Blast Pop Match Mania is an exciting puzzle-blasting adventure game!
Bubble Blast Pop Match Mania is a free, relaxing, and enjoyable bubble pop game. Play this bubble pop origin game to relieve the day’s stress.

Train your brain with this original bubble mania game as you blast them all online/offline anytime! anywhere!

Bubble Shooter is an addictive puzzle game! Bubble Blast Pop Match Mania is free! Download, relax and enjoy!

[How to Play]
• It Is extremely simple to play.
• Aim, release, and then shoot! The bubbles will fly out and hit the target. You will not only enjoy the popping animation but also the bubble pop sound effect!
• Connect three or more bubbles of the same color to clear the board!
• Use powerful boosters & items to help you blast through levels!
• Pop 7 bubbles in a row to get a free laser beam item.
• Drop 10+ bubbles at once to get a free bomb.
• Beat levels using fewer shots to earn a higher score and earn 3 stars!

[Features]
• Beat levels more quickly: 5 Special Boosters help you beat levels easily!: Bomb, Guide, Rainbow, Lightning, and Laser Beam
• Added New Enjoy Bubble: Mast, Morph, Morph Mine, Color Splash, UFO, Glue Gunner, Curtain.
• Client download size less than 40MB
• No worries, even if you don't have WiFi. You can enjoy the game from anywhere, anytime.
